name: blueprint-fullstack-example
description: Minimal fullstack (MERN-style) example with GitHub Workflow Blueprint

scripts.build: pnpm --filter client build && pnpm --filter server build
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter client lint && pnpm --filter server lint
scripts.type-check: pnpm --filter client type-check && pnpm --filter server type-check
scripts.test: pnpm --filter client test && pnpm --filter server test
scripts.clean: rm -rf client/dist client/node_modules server/dist server/node_modules node_modules
